statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.headline: Campbell pulls away from Gardner-Webb, 78-59
article.story: BUIES CREEK, N.C. -- Andrew Ryan scored 21 points and grabbed eight rebounds to help Campbell beat Gardner-Webb 78-59 on Monday night. Reco McCarter had 18 points for Campbell (8-14, 2-7 Big South), D.J. Mason added 13 points and Kyre' Hamer 10 with nine rebounds, six assists and four steals. Campbell held a 37-30 lead at halftime and opened up the second half on a 9-3 run, capped by a Ryan 3-pointer. Campbell hit 61.9 percent of its field goals in the second half and held Gardner-Webb to 31.8. Jerome Hill led Gardner-Webb (13-9, 5-4) with 16 points and 13 rebounds for his 10th double-double of the season. Hill is now two rebounds away from moving into second place on the program's all-time Division I list. Adonis Burbage had 12 points, Jarvis Davis added 10 more and Tyler Strange dished out 10 assists for the Runnin' Bulldogs.
